objects.text:
• Premium Bubble Solution
• Non-Toxic & Eco-Friendly
• Hours of Endless Fun
• Made in USA

product_details.description: This top secret “super solution” has been formulated to create the biggest, brightest, most colorful bubbles on earth! You’ll be ready for hours and hours of fun with your favorite gazillion products with this oversized solution refill bottle. This premium solution is eco-friendly, safe, non-toxic, and will not stain clothing or furniture. With Gazillion Bubbles, you’ll run out of breath before you run out of bubbles! Great Bubbles for Kids.  Appropriate for ages 3 years and up. Multi-color.

banner_details:
This vibrant promotional banner features a playful and energetic design suited for a kids' product. The background displays a colorful composition of light purple and green overlapping circles and blocks, giving it a bubbly, fun aesthetic. The main heading (id: "heading") uses a bold, cartoon-like font in bright purple, while the subheading (id: "subheading") below it stands out in a vivid green, further accentuating the playful theme. Beneath, a small product description (id: "description") appears in a clean, legible sans-serif font. The product image (id: "product_image") is prominently presented on the right. Pricing (id: "price") is displayed within a green circle, complemented by a green call-to-action button (id: "cta_background") labeled with white text (id: "cta").

**Color Palette**:
- Bright Purple: #8A2BE2  
- Vibrant Green: #74D147  
- Soft Black: #333333  
- White: #FFFFFF
product_color: The product image features a vibrant and playful color palette, perfect for an advertisement banner targeting children or a fun-loving audience. The dominant lime green (#A1EB76) of the bottle exudes freshness and energy. The cap is a deep purple (#7D39B3), which contrasts well with the green to draw focus upward. The label features a rainbow of lively tones, with the word "Gazillion" shaded in bright yellow (#FEEB3B), vivid lime (#BDF400), and outlined in royal purple (#642F9B), giving it boldness and depth. Background elements like bubbles in soft pastels (#DCE9FB, #EFCBFF) enhance the whimsical tone while maintaining color harmony.
